feedback.title: Feedback Questionnaire
feedback.subtitle: Your Opinion
feedback.description: Help me improve my services! Your opinion is very important to me. It will take about 3 minutes.
feedback.email.label: Email (optional - if you want me to contact you)
feedback.thankYou.title: Thank you for your time!
feedback.thankYou.message: Your feedback has been saved and will help me improve my services.
feedback.rateLimitError: Too many attempts. Please try again in an hour.
feedback.submitError: An error occurred while submitting the survey. Please try again.
feedback.questions.discovery_source: How did you find out about my services?
feedback.questions.website_ease: How would you rate the ease of use of my website?
feedback.questions.technical_issues: Did you encounter any technical difficulties while using my infrastructure (website, forms)?
feedback.questions.offer_clarity: How clearly do I describe what I do?
feedback.questions.missing_offer_info: Was there anything missing in the offer that would make it easier for you to make a decision?
feedback.questions.is_client: Have we worked together and are you my client?
feedback.questions.contact_form_satisfac: Was the form of contact (communication channels) suitable for you?
feedback.questions.communication_style: Was the way I addressed you appropriate?
feedback.questions.response_speed: How would you rate the speed of response to your inquiries?
feedback.questions.work_delivery_time: How would you rate the time of completing the agreed work?
feedback.questions.unpopular_tasks: Which tasks in your company do employees not like to do manually?
feedback.questions.time_consuming_proces: Which operational processes take the most time for the team per week?
feedback.questions.one_tech_change: If you could change one specific thing in your company with technology starting tomorrow, what would it be?
feedback.questions.tech_readiness: How ready is your team for technological changes?
feedback.questions.would_recommend: Would you recommend working with me to other entrepreneurs and why?
feedback.questions.missing_product: Is there a product missing in the offer that you would be interested in?
seo.feedback.title: Feedback Questionnaire - Sławomir Woźniak
seo.feedback.description: Share your opinion about my services. Your feedback will help me improve my offer and better meet your needs.
